software.notes: Not currently meaningfully calculable or estimatable

employee_hardware.notes: Embodied carbon of purchased laptops and monitors, using production and transportation figures from manufacturers' product lifecycle reports

network_hardware.notes: Loose estimate, based on minimal hardware purchase

server_hardware.notes: No servers or storage hardware purchased

onsite_employee_hardware.notes: Calculated using UK grid carbon intensity 2023; exact laptop and monitor counts; and, average laptop and monitor power consumption figures

networking.notes: Loose estimate, based on known minimal networking infrastructure

servers.notes: Loose estimate, based on known minimal infrastructure

offsite_employee_hardware.notes: Calculated using UK grid carbon intensity 2023; exact laptop and monitor counts; and, average laptop and monitor power consumption figures

cloud_services.notes: Full cloud estate measured using Cloud Carbon Footprinting tool

saas.notes: Spend-based estimate calculated using Plan A platform

managed_services.notes: Loose estimate, based on known minimal managed services

end_user_devices.notes: Calculated based on www website traffic figures

network_data_transfer.notes: Calculated based on emissions estimate associated with www website and its traffic figures
